articles.title: Today I'm toying with
articles.description: The simple joy of gadgets â€” that's what "Today I'm Toying With" is all about. It's our video series where we try to encapsulate that joy of playing with technology, sharing what it's like to experience gadgets that not all of us get to touch! Like a 3D printer that prints delicious chocolate, or the […]
articles.author: Sean Hollister
